The tent is up, the fans are out, it's a great day for football!  Come join us at tailgates at OU and at OSU...  Hope to see you there!
Happy Constitution Day!  Please remember to tell your friends and family to vote for Constitutional Conservative for Attorney General!

Thanks to all the people of Henryetta today for an awesome time!  What a great parade!
Thanks to everyone who came out in Tahlequah and Elk City today.  Always a good time meeting the people of our great state!
Had a wonderful time meeting the people of Tahlequah today!
Come say hello at the Cherokee National Holiday Parade this morning or later this afternoon at the Elk City Rodeo Parade!

Had a great time today at the parade in Tecumseh!  Met alot of great people who share the vision for this great state and nation of ours...
I am in Lawton today for a press conference about a very special 2nd amendment issue. Come join us at the Comanche county GOP headquarters!
Come join us tonite at the GOP headquarters in tulsa and okc at 6 for sign building and putting together!
Thanks to all our volunteers who went to all the events throughout the state this weekend!  We are really picking it up again, get ready!
Hello everyone! We are starting to gear up again and really get into the general election.  Anyone that wants to volunteer, let us know!
Thank u to everyone who made today possible!  We are so blessed.  What an honor to win this nomination.  November here we come!
Today is the day and the polls are now open! What a great nation we live in that allows us to join and participate in the election process.
It's hard to believe it, but there is only one week left! We are so close to the end, let's keep up the great work!
Two weeks from today everyone! Everybody is doing a fantastic job, keep up the great work and let's finish strong!
Show your support for my campaign by voting in the online poll at http://tiny.cc/avwru.  Thanks for your continued support!
